resources.string: Welcome to Tic Tac Toe in 3D
Get 4 in a row to win!!
Try again, check the hint.
Don\'t forget to confirm your moveEntity!
Tap the square to make your first moveEntity.
Tap again on the highlighted square to confirm.
You can also win across grids.
Look at the grid formation to complete your row.
Are you sure this moveEntity will complete your row?
Can you find your winning moveEntity?
Are you sure this is the winning moveEntity?
Well done, you have won your first game!!
Let\'s try to win in a different way.
Start in the same position.
Choose a square a step down or across in the next grid.
See if you can find the next step in the next grid.
Find the final square to win.
Well done, you have won your second game!!
Choose a square a step down in all 3 dimensions.
See if you can find the next 3 dimensional moveEntity.
Find the final 3D moveEntity to win!
You have won the game using all 3 dimension in each moveEntity!!!
You are now ready to proceed to play on your own.
